statements: DELETE FROM sustainability_metrics WHERE farm_name = 'Farm A';
DELETE FROM sustainability_metrics WHERE carbon_footprint > 100 AND water_usage < 50;
DELETE FROM urban_farming WHERE farming_name = 'Organic Farm';
DELETE FROM urban_farming WHERE location = 'New York' AND farming_area > 1000;

DELETE FROM Water_Usage WHERE id = 100;
DELETE FROM Carbon_Footprint WHERE carbon_emission > 10;
DELETE FROM Water_Usage WHERE Farm_ID = 1 AND Date = '2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM Carbon_Footprint WHERE Carbon_Emission > 100 AND Date < '2021-12-01';
